product.name: Pia Ricco Wall Sconces Set of 2, Bedside Wall Lamps with Switch for Bedroom, Modern Bathroom Light Fixtures with Clear Glass Shade, Oil Rubbed Bronze Sconces Wall Lights for Living Room, Hallway
product.bullet_points:
• Upgrades Design & Durable Materials - The modern wall sconces set of two has been updated with a rotary switch, allowing you to adjust the brightness conveniently. Bathroom light made of durable matte black metal with clear glass shade, creating a wonderful atmosphere by emitting bright light
• Wall light fixtures for various scenes - The black sconces wall decor set of 2 is suitable for indoor use and can be installed anywhere you like. Such as bathrooms, bedrooms, living rooms, vanities, porches, hallways, or commercial bars & Cafes
• Specification & Bulb Recommendations - Vanity lights specification: 9.2"x4.9"x6.5". Bedside wall lamps set of 2 is compatible with any type of bulb with E26 scoket, such as edison, incandescent, halogen, LED, or CFL (Bulb NOT Included). Different bulbs will create different atmospheres with the wall lights for bedroom
• UP And DOWN Mount Way - Our sconces wall lighting can be installed downward as bathroom light fixtures or bedroom lights for wall, or upward as a fireplace light or dining room wall light. If you need to use wall sconces as bedside wall lamps, you can install it lower
• Easy to Install - All hardwares for installation is included in the bedroom wall lights package. Simply follow the instructions to connect the wires, and it's ready to use
